text_block_list.text: One day after work, I returned to my room when――
As per the rules, it should've always been around my neck, but… Did I drop it somewhere? I've gotta hurry up and look for it!
I walked around the Academy searching for my Trainer Badge. But――
I should look again to see if it fell in a corner or something. So, I focused particularly intently on one spot――
――Oh!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry! Are you alright? You're not hurt, are you?
choice_data_list:
Sorry, the fault is all mine, I wasn't looking where I was 
going…

Sorry, the fault is all mine, I wasn't looking where I was 
going…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Not at all, I'm glad we're both OK! ――Though, you look a bit like you're in dire straits.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: She was staring at the floor just now, too… Could it be, maybe she was also looking for something important?
I told her that I had actually dropped my Trainer Badge, and was in the process of looking for it…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Your Trainer Badge! That's a tough one.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: The grounds of Tracen Academy are off-limits to everyone but officials. Without a badge, perhaps you might be misunderstood as a suspicious person…?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Speaking of which, did you know? There was once a scoundrel who entered the school late at night without permission.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Chuckling to himself, he was walking alone down the empty, quiet, pitch-black hallway…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: At that very moment, I heard the clop, clop of footsteps not my own approaching… I turned around, and the next thing I knew, Miss Tazuna was standing there with a big smile on her face――!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Fufu… Just kidding!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Take a look in your pocket, Trainer.
When I was told this so suddenly, I searched my pockets in wonder, and――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I picked it up there just a few moments ago. What a stroke of luck to come across its owner so soon!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I figured it might've been you, judging by your panic and the lack of a badge on your lapel… Glad I was spot on!
choice_data_list: When did you… in my pocket…?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I slipped it in a little when we bumped into each other earlier. Magic tricks are my forte! Fufufu, were you surprised?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: But I think I startled you just a tad too much. I didn't want to simply return it normally, I wanted to make it a fun surprise, but… my apologies.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ah, I know! How about dinner to make up for it? This time, I'll entertain you, Trainer!
choice_data_list: I'd rather you just let me thank you, though…
I'd rather you just let me thank you, though…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Well, then, let's call it a "come to dinner with me" thank-you! Now, shall we go to the cafeteria, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: By the way, Trainer, did you know? Today's the day they're adding a bread special to the menu!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: They'll be offering an even greater variety of deli bread than usual, and even more delicious than the Carrot Bread, I highly recommend… the Carrot Bread EX!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Which one would you like, Trainer? I'll get you whatever you like, so feel free to let me know!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: You must have walked all over campus looking for your badge, haven't you? You must be tired. Eat up and restore your energy!
――After that, the fatigue of looking around for my badge was gone thanks to Fuji Kiseki's taking care of me.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ――Trainer, how do you like the taste?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I've taken your preferences into account and selected a dessert that I think will suit your palate.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Truly!? Right on, yes!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …Ah, sorry, I got carried away just then. When I see you happy, Trainer, it makes me happy as well!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, you have a kind heart for thinking that, that's for sure.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I just wanted to provide you with the best time we could possibly have together.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: The entertainer that always delights everyone, "Fuji Kiseki"! That's who I'd like to be.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Fuji-senpaaaaaiiii!! This is bad, this is bad, class-one crisis!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Oh, Biko! What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: The TV in my dorm is busted! Everyone is having trouble watching the nightly race broadcasts!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That is quite the crisis! Right, I'll be right there. Thanks for letting me know, Biko!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ah! Fuji-senpai, there you aaare～!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: C'mon, c'mon, it's so boring without senpaai! Show us your super cool magic tricks again just like you did before～!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha, you're a Pony-chan in a fix. Okay, okay, I'll be right there, just wait for me at the dorms!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ―Trainer, I'm going to head back to the dorms first. You gave me a great time today. Thanks!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Well, then, I'll see you around!
With an uplifting smile, Fuji Kiseki took her leave.
If I'm not mistaken, Fuji Kiseki is also the head of Ritto Dormitory. From what I saw earlier, it seems that everyone tends to rely on her.
What in the world would Fuji Kiseki, well-liked by everyone and saying she wants to "entertain everyone," run like――?
I was on my way home, imagining it.
